name: jazzify.ai
description: Automatic convert songs into Jazz style

scripts.reinstall: rimraf node_modules && npm cache clean -force && npm install
scripts.material:dev: cp node_modules/daemonite-material/css/material.css dist/css/material.min.css && cp node_modules/daemonite-material/js/material.js dist/js/material.min.js && cp node_modules/daemonite-material/css/material.css.map dist/css/material.css.map && cp node_modules/daemonite-material/js/material.js.map dist/js/material.js.map
scripts.copy: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:static
scripts.css:build: npm run css:prefix && cleancss -o dist/css/jazzify.ai.css dist/css/jazzify.ai.css
scripts.js:build: npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/js/jazzify.ai.js -- dist/js/jazzify.ai.js
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run copy
scripts.dev: npm run prebuild && npm run material:dev && npm run css:dev && npm run js:dev
scripts.kill: lsof -n -i:8080 | grep LISTEN | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:static'
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run material:build && npm run css:build && npm run js:build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run upload

author: Luyan Yu
